info.name: API about eBusiness Afrique
info.description:
As part of eBA's activities, here is a web application develop for the electronic management of documents related to these projects. API about eBusiness Afrique including: Users, Projects, Documents and Histories about documents.

This API allows for user authentication, user management, project management, and document management with file upload capabilities.

Github: [follow the project ](https://github.com/bebagodfried/api-rest_docman) by [@bebagodfried](https://github.com/bebagodfried)

item.name: Authorization

response.name: Error: login validation failed
Error: invalid fields
Error: required fields
Error: fields values already taken

item.description: The **authorization** process determining whether an authenticated user has permission to perform a specific action or access a resource.

response.name: Success: get all users with success
Success: created a user with success
Error: registration validation failed
Success: successfully found a user by ID
Error: update validation failed
Success: get all projects with success
Error: project data validation failed
Success: successfuly found a project by ID
Success: get all archived projects with success
Success: get all documents with success
Success: successfully found a document by ID
Error: document data validate with errors
Success: get all histories about documents
Success: get histories about a documents by ID
Success: successfully get histories by document ID
Error: 400 Bad Request
response.body: "Histories or document bad request, please check and try again"
